info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28590
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28590
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=MEPRD9Cv1GOzv5LVTckGvmCjNpNWLQliWG7ksedZEzw"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28590
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28590
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=MEPRD9Cv1GOzv5LVTckGvmCjNpNWLQliWG7ksedZEzw"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 25679
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 25679
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns104.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	dns104.ovh.net.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27902
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27902
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	60	IN	SOA	dns104.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2025050118 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16448
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 16448
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx1.mail.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	100 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	5 mx2.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: s-maxage=31536000 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src * https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src * 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr *.posthog.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ; frame-src 'none'; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin Date: Sun, 11 May 2025 04:37:30 GMT Etag: "41bww2404fp3m" Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=() Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Nextjs-Cache: HIT X-Nextjs-Prerender: 1 X-Nextjs-Stale-Time: 4294967294 X-Request-Id: c0a3c0bc-3136-43d7-93c9-b30de963efed X-Request-Id: c0a3c0bc-3136-43d7-93c9-b30de963efed X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

Nouveauté !Facili-TACCT vous propose désormais 4 types de territoires supplémentaires : les PETR (Pôle d’équilibre territorial et rural), les PNR (Parc naturel régional), les EPT (Établissement public territorial) et les Départements.

Vulnérable aux impacts du changement climatique ?

Objectivez votre diagnostic avec les données socio-économiques qui rendent votre territoire unique et découvrez des arguments et ressources pour mobiliser vos collègues et partenaires externes sur l'adaptation au changement climatique

Evaluez la sensibilité de votre territoire

Déchiffrez les données socio-économiques qui rendent votre territoire unique

Facilitez les conditions du dialogue

Découvrez des ressources pour faciliter les conditions du dialogue avec vos élus, services techniques et partenaires

L'adaptation n'est possible qu’en intelligence collective

Les initiatives d'adaptation au changement climatique réussissent lorsqu'elles sont abordées de manière transversale et collaborative en impliquant les élus et différentes expertises thématiques.

République
Française

Facili-TACCT - adaptez votre territoire au changement climatique est un service porté par l’Agence de la transition écologique (ADEME), en partenariat avec Météo France.
Notre mission : Accompagner les territoires pour une meilleure appropriation de leur vulnérabilité aux impacts du changement climatique. Facili-TACCT met à disposition les données climatiques du patch 4°C, mesure 23 du plan national d’adaptation au changement climatique (PNACC 3).

  • info.gouv.fr
  • service-public.fr
  • legifrance.gouv.fr
  • data.gouv.fr
  • Accessibilité : non conforme
  • Mentions légales
  • Politique de confidentialité
  • Politique des cookies

Sauf mention explicite de propriété intellectuelle détenue par des tiers, les contenus de ce site sont proposés sous licence etalab-2.0

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
